content: रूप् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (रूपयति ते, रूपित) {@--1@} To form, fashion. {@--2@} To represent on the stage, act, gesticulate; रथवेगं निरूप्य <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--3@} To mark, observe carefully, behold, look at. {@--4@} To find out, seek. {@--5@} To consider, ponder over. {@--6@} To settle, fix upon. {@--7@} To examine, investigate. {@--8@} To feign. {@--9@} To appoint.
